name: Advanced Backend Development - Skills Profile
description: Skills assertions for students completing CS-401: Advanced Backend Development course
targetDescription: Advanced course covering distributed systems, microservices architecture, and cloud-native application development using Go and PostgreSQL.

assertions.name: Go Programming - Course Outcome
assertions.description: Demonstrates advanced proficiency in Go programming through course projects and assessments

skill.name: Go Programming Language
skill.description: Advanced proficiency in Go (Golang) programming language for building scalable, concurrent backend services and microservices architectures

proficiencyLevel.name: Advanced
proficiencyLevel.description: Applies Go independently in complex contexts including distributed systems and microservices. Can design scalable architectures and implement advanced patterns.

assertions.learningOutcome: Design and implement distributed microservices using Go, including proper error handling, concurrency patterns, and performance optimization
assertions.assessmentMethod: Project-based assessment with code review and technical interview

assertions.name: PostgreSQL Database Design - Course Outcome

skill.name: PostgreSQL Database Design and Optimization
skill.description: Advanced database design, query optimization, indexing strategies, and performance tuning for PostgreSQL

proficiencyLevel.name: Advanced
proficiencyLevel.description: Designs complex database schemas, optimizes queries for performance, and implements advanced PostgreSQL features

assertions.learningOutcome: Design normalized database schemas, write optimized queries, and implement advanced PostgreSQL features including JSONB, full-text search, and partitioning
assertions.assessmentMethod: Database design project with performance benchmarking

skill.name: Microservices Architecture
skill.description: Design and implementation of microservices-based systems including service discovery, API gateways, and inter-service communication

proficiencyLevel.name: Intermediate
proficiencyLevel.description: Implements microservices architectures with guidance, understanding core patterns and trade-offs

assertions.learningOutcome: Decompose monolithic applications into microservices, implement service communication patterns, and handle distributed system challenges
assertions.assessmentMethod: Team project building a microservices-based application

skill.name: Docker Containerization
skill.description: Container creation, orchestration, and deployment using Docker and Docker Compose

proficiencyLevel.name: Intermediate
proficiencyLevel.description: Creates Dockerfiles, manages multi-container applications with Docker Compose, and understands container networking

assertions.learningOutcome: Containerize applications, create efficient Docker images, and orchestrate multi-container applications
assertions.assessmentMethod: Containerization of course project with Docker Compose configuration

skill.name: RESTful API Design
skill.description: Design and implementation of RESTful APIs following best practices for versioning, authentication, and documentation

proficiencyLevel.name: Advanced
proficiencyLevel.description: Designs robust RESTful APIs with proper resource modeling, versioning strategies, and comprehensive error handling

assertions.learningOutcome: Design RESTful APIs following OpenAPI specification, implement proper HTTP semantics, and document APIs comprehensively
assertions.assessmentMethod: API design review and implementation quality assessment
